test-set.name: prod-CastExpr.schema
test-set.description: Tests for the CastExpr production with user-defined types

schema.description: A schema user defined types and constructor tests
A Schema of union and list defined types

test-case.name: qname-cast-1
test-case.description: Evaluates casting an xs:QName type to another xs:QName type.
test-case.test: xs:QName("value1") cast as xs:QName

test-case.name: qname-cast-2
test-case.description: Evaluates casting a type derived from an xs:QName to an xs:QName type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $var := myType:QNameBased("value1") return $var cast as xs:QName

test-case.name: qname-cast-3
test-case.description: Evaluates casting a type derived from an xs:QName to a type derived from xs:QName.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $var := myType:QNameBased("value1") return $var cast as myType:QNameBased

test-case.name: qname-cast-4
test-case.description: Evaluates casting a xs:QName type to a type derived from xs:QName.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $var := xs:QName("value1") return $var cast as myType:QNameBased

test-case.name: notation-cast-2
test-case.description: Evaluates casting a type derived from an xs:NOTATION to an xs:NOTATION type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType = "http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; myType:NOTATIONBased("myType:value1") cast as xs:NOTATION

test-case.name: notation-cast-3
test-case.description: Evaluates casting a type derived from an xs:NOTATION to a type derived from xs:NOTATION.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType = "http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; myType:NOTATIONBased("myType:value1") cast as myType:NOTATIONBased

test-case.name: casthcds1
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation of a simple expression casted as xs:integer - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: casthcds2
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation of a simple expression casted as xs:float - xml data source - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; ((/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:float) eq xs:float(12678967543233)

test-case.name: casthcds3
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation of a simple expression casted as xs:boolean - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:boolean

test-case.name: casthcds4
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation of a simple expression casted as xs:double - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:double

test-case.name: casthcds5
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation of a simple expression casted as xs:decimal - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:decimal

test-case.name: casthcds6
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation of a simple expression casted as xs:string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds7
test-case.description: Simple test for evaluation a string casted as xs:string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:string) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds8
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a float as a float - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; ((/atomic:root/atomic:float) cast as xs:float) eq xs:float(1267.43233E12)

test-case.name: casthcds9
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a float as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; ((/atomic:root/atomic:float) cast as xs:string)

test-case.name: casthcds10
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a float as a double
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; xs:float(((/atomic:root/atomic:float) cast as xs:double)) eq xs:float(1267.43233E12)

test-case.name: casthcds11
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a float as a boolean
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:float) cast as xs:boolean

test-case.name: casthcds12
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a double as a double - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:double) cast as xs:double

test-case.name: casthcds13
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a double as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; ((/atomic:root/atomic:double) cast as xs:string) eq xs:string("A String Function")

test-case.name: casthcds14
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a double as a float - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; ((/atomic:root/atomic:double) cast as xs:float) eq xs:float(1267.43233E12)

test-case.name: casthcds15
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a double as a boolean - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:double) cast as xs:boolean

test-case.name: casthcds16
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a decimal as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:decimal) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds17
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a decimal as a float - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:decimal) cast as xs:float

test-case.name: casthcds18
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a decimal as a double - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:decimal) cast as xs:double

test-case.name: casthcds19
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a decimal as a decimal - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:decimal) cast as xs:decimal

test-case.name: casthcds20
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a decimal as a integer - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:decimal) cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: casthcds21
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a decimal as a boolean - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:decimal) cast as xs:boolean

test-case.name: casthcds22
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an integer as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds23
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an integer as a float - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; ((/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:float) eq xs:float(12678967543233)

test-case.name: casthcds24
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an integer as a double - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:double

test-case.name: casthcds25
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an integer as a decimal - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:decimal

test-case.name: casthcds26
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an integer as an integer - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: casthcds27
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an integer as a boolean - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:integer) cast as xs:boolean

test-case.name: casthcds28
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an dateTime as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:dateTime) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds29
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an dateTime as a dateTime - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:dateTime) cast as xs:dateTime

test-case.name: casthcds30
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an dateTime as a time - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:dateTime) cast as xs:time

test-case.name: casthcds31
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an dateTime as a date - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:dateTime) cast as xs:date

test-case.name: casthcds32
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an date as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:date) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds33
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an date as a dateTime - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:date) cast as xs:dateTime

test-case.name: casthcds34
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an date as a date - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:date) cast as xs:date

test-case.name: casthcds35
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an xs:time as a string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:time) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds36
test-case.description: Simple test for casting an xs:time as an xs:time - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:time) cast as xs:time

test-case.name: casthcds37
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a boolean as string - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:boolean) cast as xs:string

test-case.name: casthcds38
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a boolean as float - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:boolean) cast as xs:float

test-case.name: casthcds39
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a boolean as double - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:boolean) cast as xs:double

test-case.name: casthcds40
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a boolean as decimal - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:boolean) cast as xs:decimal

test-case.name: casthcds41
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a boolean as integer - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:boolean) cast as xs:integer

test-case.name: casthcds42
test-case.description: Simple test for casting a boolean as boolean - XML Data Source
test-case.test: import schema namespace atomic="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest"; (/atomic:root/atomic:boolean) cast as xs:boolean

test-case.name: user-defined-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of simple user defined data type restricted from xs:integer.

modified.change: Bug #19783 - moved assertion as an eq operation inside the test

test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $value := myType:sizeType(1) return ($value eq 1)

test-case.name: user-defined-2
test-case.description: Evaluation of constructor function vioalation on user defined data type restricted from xs:integer.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $value := myType:sizeType(20) return $value

test-case.name: user-defined-3
test-case.description: Evaluation of constructor function used as part of addition operation user defined data type restricted from xs:integer.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $value := myType:sizeType(1) + myType:sizeType(2) return $value

test-case.name: user-defined-4
test-case.description: Evaluation of simple user defined data type restricted from xs:string.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; let $value := myType:stringBased("valid value 4") return $value

test-case.name: user-defined-5
test-case.description: Evaluation of constructor function operation on simple user defined data type restricted from xs:string.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; fn:concat(myType:stringBased("valid value 4"),myType:stringBased("valid value 1"))

test-case.name: user-defined-6
test-case.description: use constructor function for user defined type and cast value to base type (xs:integer) restricted from xs:integer.

modified.change: Bug #19783 - moved assertion as an eq operation inside the test

test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; (myType:sizeType(2) cast as xs:integer) eq 2

test-case.name: user-defined-7
test-case.description: use constructor function for user defined type and check if it is castable value to base type (xs:integer) restricted from xs:integer.
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; myType:sizeType(2) castable as xs:integer

test-case.name: user-defined-8
test-case.description: Use constructor function to evaluate if two user defined types can be casted to another. Restricted from xs:integer and xs;float.

modified.change: Bug #19783 - moved assertion as an eq operation inside the test

test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; (myType:sizeType(16) cast as myType:floatBased) eq 16

test-case.name: user-defined-9
test-case.description: Use constructor function to evaluate if two user defined types are castable to another restricted from xs:integer and xs:float
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; myType:sizeType(16) castable as myType:floatBased

test-case.name: user-defined-10
test-case.description: Use constructor function to use addition operation on two user defined types. Restricted from xs:integer and xs:float
test-case.test: import schema namespace myType="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/userDefinedTypes"; myType:sizeType(16) + myType:floatBased (16)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-1
test-case.description: Test the union type that should return an xs:integer value
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; 123 cast as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-2
test-case.description: Test the union type that should return an xs:integer value
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "123" cast as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-3
test-case.description: Test the decimal value cast to the union type. Should return the xs:integer value
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; 123.12 cast as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-4
test-case.description: Test the string of decimal value cast to union type. Should fail on the grounds that the string value is not in the lexical space of the union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "123.12" cast as s:myUnionType1

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-5
test-case.description: Test cast to union type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "IB123456789" cast as s:myUnionType2

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-5a
test-case.description: Test the string of decimal value cast to union type. Should fail on the grounds that the string value is not in the lexical space of the union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "AD123456789" cast as s:myUnionType2

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-6
test-case.description: Test decimal value cast to a union type using a constructor function. Should return an xs:integer value
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:myUnionType1(123.12)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-7
test-case.description: Test decimal value cast to a union type using a constructor function supplied as a NamedFunctionRef. Should return an xs:integer value

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-8
test-case.description: Test decimal value cast to a union type using a constructor function found using function lookup. Should return an xs:integer value

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-9
test-case.description: Test decimal value cast to a union type using a constructor function found using partial function application. Should return an xs:integer value

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-10
test-case.description: Cast to a namespace-sensitive union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; namespace-uri-from-QName("xs:integer" cast as s:sensitiveUnion)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-11
test-case.description: Constructor function for a namespace-sensitive union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; namespace-uri-from-QName(s:sensitiveUnion('xs:integer'))

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-12
test-case.description: Constructor function for a namespace-sensitive union type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:sensitiveUnion('xs:integer') instance of s:sensitiveUnion

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-13
CastAs-UnionType-14
CastAs-UnionType-15
CastAs-UnionType-16
test-case.description: Constructor function for union type with facets
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:lowercaseName('xs:integer') instance of s:sensitiveUnion

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-17
test-case.description: Union type with facets cannot be used in SequenceType
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:lowercaseName('xs:integer') instance of s:lowercaseName

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-18
test-case.description: Type of a constructor function for a "plain" union type

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-19
test-case.description: Cast to a union type from one of its member type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; node-name(<a/>) castable as s:sensitiveUnion

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-20
test-case.description: Cast to a union type from one of its member type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; local-name-from-QName(s:sensitiveUnion(node-name(<a/>)))

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-21
test-case.description: Cast to a union type from a subtype of one of its member type
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:sensitiveUnion(xs:ID("zorobastic"))

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-22
test-case.description: Failing cast to a union type with facets
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:lowercaseName('xs:QName')

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-23
test-case.description: Failing cast to a union type with facets
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:lowercaseName(xs:NCName('ABC123'))

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-24
test-case.description: Failing dynamic cast to a union type with facets

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-25
test-case.description: Cast QName to a union type including QName as a member: prefix does not need to be in scope

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-26
test-case.description: Type of a constructor function for a "faceted" union type

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-27
test-case.description: Cast to a union of list types (namespace sensitive)
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "a b c" cast as s:unionOfLists

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-28
test-case.description: Cast to a union of list types (namespace sensitive)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-29
test-case.description: Constructor function to a union of list types (namespace sensitive)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-30
test-case.description: Function literal for constructor to a union of list types (namespace sensitive)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-31
test-case.description: Function lookup for constructor to a union of list types (namespace sensitive)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-32
test-case.description: Type of constructor function to a union of list types (namespace sensitive)

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-33
test-case.description: Cast to a union type from a node whose typed value is one of its member types

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-34
test-case.description: Cast to a union type derived by restriction
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:restrictedUnion('2012-10-08')

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-35
test-case.description: Failing cast to a union type derived by restriction
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:restrictedUnion('1912-10-08')

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-36
test-case.description: Cast from a union type to string

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-37
test-case.description: Cast from a union type to one of the member types

test-case.name: CastAs-UnionType-38
test-case.description: Cast from a union type to one of the member types

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-1
test-case.description: Cast to a list type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:decimalListType1("2 2.3")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-2
test-case.description: Cast to list type with pattern restriction. Should return sequence of integers
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:myRestrictedList1("123 987 567 456")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-3
test-case.description: Cast to list type with pattern restriction. Doesn't satisfy the pattern
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:myRestrictedList1("123 987 567 456 877")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-4
test-case.description: Cast the expression to the defined list type.
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "text1 text2 text3" cast as s:strListType1

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-5
test-case.description: Cast the expression to the defined list type. The test should fail as the base type for the list is decimal
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "1.1 2.1 text3" cast as s:decimalListType1

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-6
test-case.description: Cast the expression to the defined list type. The test should fail as the base type for the list is decimal
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "1.1 2.1 3.1" cast as s:intListType1

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-7
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type IDREFS.
test-case.test: "a b c" cast as xs:IDREFS

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-8
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type IDREFS: fails because minLength=1
test-case.test: xs:IDREFS("")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-9
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type IDREFS: using function literal
test-case.test: let $f := xs:IDREFS#1 return $f("a b c")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-10
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type IDREFS: using function lookup
test-case.test: let $f := function-lookup(QName('http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema', 'IDREFS'), 1) return $f("a b c")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-11
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type IDREFS: using partial apply
test-case.test: let $f := xs:IDREFS(?) return $f("a b c")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-12
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type NMTOKENS.
test-case.test: "a b c" cast as xs:NMTOKENS

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-13
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type NMTOKENS: fails because minLength=1
test-case.test: xs:NMTOKENS("")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-14
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type ENTITIES.
test-case.test: "a b c" cast as xs:ENTITIES

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-15
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type ENTITIES: fails because minLength=1
test-case.test: xs:ENTITIES(" ")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-16
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type ENTITIES: fails because an item is numeric
test-case.test: xs:ENTITIES(" a b c 12 ")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-17
test-case.description: Cast to a built-in list type ENTITIES: fails because input is not a string
test-case.test: xs:ENTITIES(xs:anyURI("abcd"))

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-18
test-case.description: Dynamic constructor to a built-in list type ENTITIES: fails because input is not a string
test-case.test: let $f := xs:ENTITIES#1 return $f(xs:anyURI("abcd"))

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-19
test-case.description: Cannot cast a sequence of xs:ENTITY values to xs:ENTITIES
test-case.test: let $f := xs:ENTITIES#1 return $f(($f("abcd"), $f("defg")))

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-20
test-case.description: Cannot use a list type name in a sequence type
test-case.test: let $v as xs:NMTOKENS := xs:NMTOKENS("a b c") return count($v)

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-21
test-case.description: Cast to a user-defined list whose member type is namespace-sensitive union.

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-22
test-case.description: Cast to list type with pattern restriction. Should return sequence of integers
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; ("123 987 567 456") cast as s:myRestrictedList1

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-23
test-case.description: Cast to list type with pattern restriction. Doesn't satisfy the pattern
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; ("123 987 567 456 877") cast as s:myRestrictedList1

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-24
test-case.description: Dynamic Cast to list type with pattern restriction. Should return sequence of integers

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-25
test-case.description: Dynamic Cast to list type with pattern restriction. Doesn't satisfy the pattern
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; s:myRestrictedList1("123 987 567 456 877")

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-26
test-case.description: Type of constructor function for casting to list

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-27
test-case.description: Type of constructor function for casting to list

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-28
test-case.description: Castable to list: true
test-case.test: "a b c" castable as xs:NMTOKENS

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-29
test-case.description: Castable to list: false
test-case.test: "a b 12" castable as xs:IDREFS

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-30
test-case.description: Castable to list: false (violates minLength)
test-case.test: " " castable as xs:NMTOKENS

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-31
test-case.description: Castable to list: false (violates pattern)
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; "123 987 567 456 229" castable as s:myRestrictedList1

test-case.name: CastAs-ListType-32
test-case.description: Castable to list: true (satisfies pattern after whitespace normalization)
test-case.test: import schema namespace s="http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/unionListDefined"; " 123 987 567 456 " castable as s:myRestrictedList1
